name: Doge Game
description:
A fun arcade game in which you have to toss up the ball. Hit the ball to toss it up. Doge, like all dogs, loves to play with a ball. You also love to play with Doge. Hit the ball. Hit the ball. Hit the ball.

This game was made on DOGE JAM in 7 days.
If you like it, I will add unique levels and develop this game.

Support the game: D9nXjkcNdehjoiNaXcU4WEsUvMcn1N4sbb
